name: Kern
tag_list: inserter, mail, document-management, records-management, enterprise-content-management, enterprise-resource-planning
overview:
Kern provides document managent solutions in two areas. Output: For high volume mail production, primarily high speed mail inserting systems and high volume e-delivery for transactional documents and Input: for document processing, workflow, and archiving. In short: Kern makes industrial envelope stuffers and software tools for create, distributing, and organizing documents.

Based in Switzerland and distributed in over 60 countries, Kern works with some of the world’s largest companies to deliver hardware and software that will produce large volumes of critical customer communications and improve the process of managing documents.

Kern launched the world’s fastest high speed mail inserting system in 2011, the Kern Ai-33direct which is capable of processing up to 33,000 envelopes per hour.

Kern will announce a strategic partnership at Graph Expo 2011, giving companies a better solution for enterprise document management. On September 12th, 2011, Kern EDGE, the electronic document gateway for the enterprise. Cloud document management tools for businesses that want to be more productive and save
